posts.post_content:
Although PMs will be read and responded to, I very much prefer email at: [url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

You can also email me for better scans, questions, comments, suggestions, etc.

A few things, so I can keep this as organized as possible:

1 -- I will address all correspondences in the order of date/time delivery into my email box (including PMs).
2 -- Please Note:  I work evenings/nights, and keep somewhat odd hours. Therefore response time may vary depending when I am on the computer. However, all correspondences will be addressed.
3 -- “I’ll take it” will take precedent over ongoing correspondences.
4 – Payment:  Paypal f/f preferred; Paypal goods please add 3%.  Check/MO fine.
5 – Free S/H
6 –  Satisfaction guaranteed.

Thanks, Scott

Scott you've given me a heart-attack !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Only wish I saw a Sullivan. That White and Walsh ohhhhh my.
What a post, Scott. Those are beautiful!

Only one card remains "on hold" --- others either sold, or now have prices.

Reduced SLs to more realistic prices :rolleyes:

Oh ....................... Josh, now that you have had your heart attack, why not have a stroke:

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=263348&d=1488052452[/IMG]

Billy is now happily in my binder :)
 
Fun, Fun, Scott :rolleyes:
Is the McGraw glove at hip still around ?

................... Prices reduced on remaining cards ....... :)


Great, Scott :rolleyes:

Let's get these off my desk ...................


.................... open to offers on remaining cards :)


[url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]


Thanks, Scott :rolleyes:

Sure thing I'll help with the Sullivan !!! :D:D:D:D:D

Just remember to let me know whenever it is that you decide to part with Mr. Billy!
